entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 4 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023
